mapper.insert: insert into members(memberid, memberpw, membername, phonenumber, birthday, addr, addr2, zipcode) values(#{memberid},#{memberpw},#{membername},#{phonenumber},#{birthday},#{addr},#{addr2},#{zipcode});
mapper.select: select memberid, memberpw from members where memberid =#{memberid} and memberpw = #{memberpw};
select checkin,checkout,roomname,adult,kid,m.membername,r.memberid from reservation r join members m on r.memberid = m.memberid where r.memberid= #{memberid}
select count(*) from members where memberid = #{memberid}
select count(*) from members where phonenumber = #{phonenumber}
